question: Which international organisation has launched an interactive service about the Covid-19 outbreak named "Health Alert", on Facebook Messenger?
option4: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
explanation:
The World Health Organization (WHO) has recently launched an interactive service on Facebook Messenger to provide accurate information about the coronavirus outbreak to the general public.
More than 1.3 billion monthly active users can resolve their queries on Covid-19 from the "Health Alert" interactive service, launched by the WHO. The global health agency had already launched an alert service on WhatsApp.
